type.name: FHCRCHanashAnnexinLamr
type.description: We have implemented a high throughput platform for quantitative analysis of serum autoantibodies which we have applied to lung cancer for discovery of novel antigens, and for validation in pre-diagnostic sera of autoantibodies to antigens previously defined based on analysis of sera collected at the time of diagnosis..
